'''''Leotia viscosa''''' (common name, '''chicken lips''') is a species of [[mushroom]] in the [[Leotiaceae]] family. Its stem color can be yellow, orange to white, and the [[pileus (mycology)|cap]] is green. The cap comes in a variety of shapes. The edibility of this mushroom is unknown. It grows under conifer trees, or on dead logs.
